songs.title: SIMAMENI WATU WOTE
songs.lyrics:
simameni watu wote leo katika nyumba ya bwana furahini mbele zake bwana imbeni nyimbo za shangwe(shangiilieni)

vigelegele (pigeni) makofi hekaluni mwake meimbieni wimbo mpya (watu wote)X2 wimbo mpya.

1.Akina mama wote (hoye) akina baba wote hoye njooni wote mbele za shangwe , njooni wote mbele za bwana, njooni leo mbarikiwe.

2.Enyi vijana wote hoye enyi wazee wote hoye njooni wote mbele za bwana mkiimba nyimbo za shangwe , njooni wote mbele za bwana njooni leo mbarikiwe

3. Watoto wetu wote njooni njooni mbele zake njooni mwimbieni wimbo mpya, chezeni mbele za bwana, mwimbieni wimbo mpya , chezani mbele za bwana

4. Siku ya furaha leo ni siku yenye heri leo tunashukuru muumba wetu tumsifu mwenyezi mungu tucheze ngoma na vinanda tumsifu mwenyezi, mungu.

songs.title: Sisi wana dunia
songs.lyrics:
Sisi wana dunia tukumbuke maneno, aliyosema Bikira Maria Alipowatokea watoto wa Fatima, Lucia Francis na Jacinta Alisema tusali, tusali rosari, tupate amani

Na tuwaombee wale wakosefu wasio na mwombezi Na wasiomwamini Yesu Mwokozi wamuamini ili waokoke

1.Mama yetu anahuzunishwa sana, na matendo yetu maovu Anajua adhabu yetu ijayo, hivyo anaona huruma sana

2.Atusihi tuache dhambi kwa dhati, tuache kumkosea Yesu Tuyatubu makosa yetu yote, ili Bwana atupatie amani

3.Tusitende maovu na dhambi, atusihi mama wa Yesu, Tusimkasirishe tena Mungu, asije tutupa motoni milele

4.Ibada ya moyo safi wa Maria, tuizingatie daima, Tupokee komunio takatifu, kila Jumamosi ya kwanza ya mwezi

songs.title: SISTER
songs.lyrics:
GOSPEL Luke 10:1-9

After this the Lord appointed seventy-two [a] others and sent them two by two ahead of him to every town and place where he was about to go. He told them, “The harvest is plentiful, but the workers are few.

Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field. Go! I am sending you out like lambs among wolves.

Do not take a purse or bag or sandals; and do not greet anyone on the road. The Gospel of the lord

SECOND READING Romans 8:28-30

And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

For those God foreknew he also predestined to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brothers and sisters.

And those he predestined, he also called; those he called, he also justified; those he justified, he also glorified. The word of the Lord

FIRST READING Jeremiah 1:4-10

And we know that The word of the Lord came to me, saying: “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you,before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.”

“Alas, Sovereign Lord,” I said, “I do not know how to speak: I am too young." But the Lord said to me, “Do not say, ‘I am too young.’ You must go to everyone I send you to and say whatever I command you.

Do not be afraid of them, for I am with you and will rescue you,” declares the Lord. Then the Lord reached out his hand and touched my mouth and said to me,

“I have put my words in your mouth. See, today I appoint you over nations and kingdoms to uproot and tear down, to destroy and overthrow, to build and to plant.” The word of the Lord

RESPONSORIAL PSALM Psalm 116:12-13.14-15.16-17 (R. 12)

R How can I repay the Lord for all his goodness to me?

How can I repay the LORD for all his goodness to me? The cup of salvation I will raise; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.

My vows to the LORD I will fulfil before all his people. How precious in the eyes of the LORD is the death of his faithful. R.

Your servant, LORD, your servant am I, the son of your handmaid; you have loosened my bonds. A thanksgiving sacrifice I make; I will call on the name of the LORD. R.

GOSPEL ACCLAMATION See John 6:63c,68c Alleluia Your words, Lord, are Spirit and life; you have the words eternal life. Alleluia.

1. Maisha yangu [yote] nakutolea [wewe] Eh Mungu wangu [Bwana] unipokee [Kwako]x2

Bwana maisha yangu mimi nampa Bwana x2, Nilivyo- navyo vyote ni mali ya Bwana Maisha yangu yote nampa Bwana x2

2. Ujana wangu [mimi], ulionipa [wewe] x1, najitolea [kwako ] kukuhudumu [wewe] x2

3. Uzee wangu ulionipa najitolea kukuhudumu

4. Nimeamua [mimi] na nyumba yangu [yote] x1, kumtumikia [Mungu] milele (yote) x2

SALA KABLA YA KOMUNIO


Ee Yesu, mkate wa mbingu, ninakututamani. Uje kwangu uliye uzima na heri yangu.


Uje, chakula cha roho yangu, unitie imara. Uje, Mwanakondoo wa Mungu, uondoe dhambi zangu.


Uje, mganga wa roho, uponye udhaifu wangu. Uje, ee Yesu, uungane nami, Amina.


SALA BAADA YA KOMUNIO


SALA YA MTAKATIFU INYASIO


Roho ya Kristu initakase. Mwili wa Kristu uniokoe.


Damu ya Kristu inichangamshe. Maji ya ubavu wa Kristu yanioshe.


Mateso ya Kristu nguvu yanizidishie. Ee Yesu mwema, unisikilize.


Katika madonda yako unifiche. Usikubali nitengane nawe.


Na adui mwovu unikinge Saa kufa kwangu unite.


Uniamuru kwako nije. Na watakatifu wako nikutukuze.


Milele na milele. Amina.


KUIOMBEA PAROKIA YETU.


K.Ee Bwana Yesu Kristu, ndiwe kichwa cha kanisa lako hapa kwetu. Kwa matumaini tunakuomba kwa ajili ya waamini wote wa parokia yetu.


Uwalinde wote walio nyumbani na ugenini. W. Usikilize maombi yetu (baada ya kila aya)


K. Uwaongoze wenye furaha na wenye huzuni Uwasaidie wenye afya na wagonjwa Uwavute watu wema na wenye bidii.


Uwaimarishe wote walio dhaifu. Uwasimamishe walioanguka.


Uwahimize wavivu na wazembe. uwaonye walio katika hatari ya kupotea.


Uwafariji wazima na wafu.


Atukuzwe Baba na Mwana na Roho Mtakatifu. Kama mwanzo na sasa na siku zote na milele milele Amina x 3


Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu. Amina.


SALA YA UKARIMU KWA MUNGU

Ee Mungu, miguu yangu imesimama madhabahuni mwako nikiwa na shukrani kuu moyoni mwangu kwa ulinzi wako na mema ambayo umetenda maishani mwangu. Wewe ndiye tegemeo langu katika kila jambo.

Naomba unipe moyo wa bidii kuhudhuria ibada zote katika hekalu hili unapoishi na kutoa Baraka za kipekee.

Nijalie moyo wa ukarimu ili niweze kutimiza wajibu wangu kwako na kwa kanisa lako. Naahidi kufanya yote kwa uaminifu. Kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu AMINA.

SALA KWA AJILI YA MWAKA WA KATEKESI

Ee Mungu, ni mapenzi yako kuwa watu wote wapate kuujua ukweli na waokoke. Tunaomba uijaze mioyo yetu na moto wa upendo wako, tupate siku zote kujifunza na kuyaelewa mafundisho ya kweli na matakatifu ya mwanao Yesu Kristu,

na ya Kanisa lako Takatifu, na kupata kuyaishi na kuyatekeleza maishani mwetu, hadi tuupate uzima wa milele kwako Mbinguni.

Tunakuomba uzidi kumbariki kila mmoja wetu kwa mapaji ya Roho wako Mtakatifu, tunapojibidiisha kuishi kikamilifu imani yetu kwa Kristu.

Wajalie wote ambao bado hawajaisikia Injili, neema ya kukujua, kukupenda na kukutumikia, katika kweli na roho siku zote za maisha yao. Tunaomba hayo kwa njia ya Kristu Bwana wetu.

KANUNI YA IMANI

Nasadiki kwa Mungu mmoja, Baba Mwenyezi, Mwumba wa mbingu na dunia na vitu vyote vinavyoonekana na visivyoonekana.

Nasadiki kwa Bwana mmoja Yesu Kristo, Mwana pekee wa Mungu, aliyezaliwa kwa Baba tangu milele yote.

Mungu aliyetoka kwa Mungu, Mwanga kwa mwanga, Mungu kweli kwa Mungu kweli, aliyezaliwa bila kuumbwa, mwenye umungu mmoja na Baba, ambaye vitu vyote vimeumbwa naye.

Alishuka kutoka Mbinguni, kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu, na kwa ajili ya wokovu wetu. Akapata mwili kwa uwezo wa Roho Mtakatifu kwake yeye Bikira Maria, akawa mwanadamu.

Akasulubiwa kwa ajili yetu sisi, kwa mamlaka ya Ponsyo Pilato; akateswa, akafa na akazikwa, siku ya tatu akafufuka, kadiri ya Maandiko, akapaa mbinguni, ameketi kuume kwa Baba.

Atakuja tena kwa utukufu, kuwahukumu wazima na wafu, na ufalme wake hautakuwa na mwisho. Nasadiki kwa Roho Mtakatifu, Bwana na mleta uzima, atokaye kwa Baba na Mwana.

Anayeabudiwa na kutukuzwa, pamoja na Baba na Mwana, aliyenena kwa vinywa vya manabii. Nasadiki kwa kanisa moja, takatifu, katoliki, la mitume.

Naungama ubatizo mmoja kwa maondoleo ya dhambi. Nangojea ufufuko wa wafu, na uzima wa milele ijayo. Amina.

Misa st Michael

Ewe Bwana utuhurumie Ewe Bwana Ewe Bwana utuhurumie X2 Ewe Kristu utuhurumie,Ewe Kristu,Ewe Kristu utuhurumie X2

Utukufu kwa Mungu Mbinguni na amani.iwe ulimwenguni kwa watu walio na Mapenzi Mema X2

1.(a) Twakusifu,Tunakuheshimu, Twakuabudu tunakutuza, Shukrani kwa tukufu wake. (b) Bwana Mungu mfalme wa Mbinguni Mungu Baba, Baba Mwenyezi Yesu Mwana wa pekee.

2 .Bwana Mungu Mwanakondoo wa Mungu Mwana Wa Baba,uondoaye dhambi za Ulimwengu upokee ombi letu Baba ukaaye kuume utuhurumie .

3 (a) Kwani ndiye Pekee Matakatifu wewe pekee yako ndiwe Bwana pekee yako mkuu yesu Kristu. (b) Pamoja na Roho Mtakatifu ni katika Matukio utukufu wako Mungu Baba Amina�

NENO LA MUNGU WETU

neno la mungu wetu linakuja nenoX2 lipokee neno ni uzima neno lipokee neno ni tulizo la roho X2

1. sote twaitwa kwake mungu wetu mwenye heri yeye mwalimu wetu atatufundisha yote X2

2. jabali langu mimi tegemoe langu bwana yeye tulizo langu nimwogope nani mimi X2

3.neno linifundishe nizishike amri zako hili nikupendeze we mungu muumba wangu X2

4.neno liniongeze nimuepuke shetani nimulikie watu wawe watumishi wako X2

NICENE CREED

I believe in one God, the Father almighty, maker of heaven and earth, of all things visible and invisible.

I believe in one Lord Jesus Christ, the Only Begotten Son of God, born of the Father before all ages.

God from God, Light from Light, true God from true God, begotten, not made, consubstantial with the Father; through him all things were made.

For us men and for our salvation he came down from heaven, and by the holy spirit was incarnate of the Virgin Mary, and became man.

For our sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate, he suffered death and was buried, and rose again on the third day in accordance with the Scriptures.

He ascended into heaven and is seated at the right hand of the Father. He will come again in glory to judge the living and the dead and his kingdom will have no end.

I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of Life, who proceeds from the Father and the Son, who with the Father and the Son is adored and glorified, who has spoken through the Prophets.

I believe in one, holy, catholic and apostolic Church. I confess one Baptism for the forgiveness of sins and I look forward to the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come. Amen

songs.title: T THE MASS DURING THE DAY25
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING Isaiah 52:7-10 All the ends of the earth shall see the salvation of Our God

How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet of him who brings good tidings, who publishes peace, who brings good tidings of good, who publishes salvation, who says to Zion, "Your God reigns."

Listen, your watchmen lift up their voice, together they sing for joy; for eye to eye they see the return of the LORD to Zion. Break forth together into singing, you waste places of Jerusalem; for the LORD has comforted his people, he has redeemed Jerusalem.

The LORD has bared his holy arm before the eyes of all the nations; and all the ends of the earth shall see the salvation of our God. The word of the Lord.

RESPONSORIAL PSALM Psalm 98:1.2-3ab-4,5-6(R.3cd)

R. All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God

O sing a new song to the LORD, for he has worked wonders. His right hand and his holy arm have brought salvation. R.

The LORD has made known his salvation, has shown his deliverance to the nations. He has remembered his merciful love and his truth for the house of Israel. R

All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God. Shout to the LORD, all the earth; break forth into joyous song, and sing out your praise, R.

Sing psalms to the LORD with the harp, with the harp and the sound of song. With trumpets and the sound of the horn, raise a shout before the King, the LORD. R.

SECOND READING Hebrews 1:1-6 God has spoken to us by a Son.

In many and various ways God spoke of old to our fathers by the prophets; but in these last days he has spoken to us by a Son, whom he appointed the heir of all things, through whom also he created the ages.

He reflects the glory of God and bears the very stamp of his nature, upholding the universe by his word of power. When he had made purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high, having become as much superior to angels as the name he has obtained is more excellent than theirs.

For to what angel did God ever say, "You are my Son, today I have begotten you"? Or again, "1 will be to him a father, and he shall be to me a son'? he brings the first-born into the world, he says,let all God angels worship him” The word of the Lord

GOSPEL ACCLAMATION ALLELUIA A hallowed day has shone upon us: come, O nations, and adore the Lord; for today a great light has come down to earth. Alleluia.

GOSPEL John 1:1-18 The Word became flesh and dwelt among us

In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. He was in the beginning with God; all things were made through him, and without him was not anything made that was made. In him was life, and the life was the light of men.

The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it There was a man sent from God, whose name was John. He came for testimony, to bear witness to the light, that all might believe through him. He was not the light, but came to bear witness to the light.

The true light that enlightens every man was coming into the world. He was in the world, and the world was made through him, yet the world knew him not. He came to his own home, and his own people received him not. But to all who received him, who believed in his name, he gave power to become children of God;

who were born, not of blood nor of the will of the flesh nor of the will of man, but of God. And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us, full of grace and truth; we have beheld his glory,as of the only-begotten Son from the Father(John bore witness to him, and cried,

"This was he of whom I said, 'He who comes after me ranks before me, for he was before me. And from his fullness have we all received, grace upon grace.

For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through Jesus Christ. No one has ever seen God; the only-begotten Son, who is in the bosom of the Father, he has made him known. The Gospel of the Lord.

Tazama Bwana tunakuja kwako (leo) Twaleta zawadi zetu mbele yako Tunakuomba Mungu Baba pokea.

Verse 4 Ee Bwana twakushukuru, nazo twakutolea sadaka twaomba Bwana pokea; Ingawa tunachokileta kwako ni kidogo ee Bwana twaomba ukipokee.


Tazama Bwana tunakuja kwako (leo) Twaleta zawadi zetu mbele yako Tunakuomba Mungu Baba pokea.

songs.title: THE JUBILEE PRAYER 2025
songs.lyrics:
THE JUBILEE PRAYER

Father in Heaven, may the faith you have given us in your Son, Jesus Christ, our brother, and the flame of charity enkindled in our hearts by the Holy Spirit,

reawaken in us the blessed hope for the coming of your Kingdom. May your grace transform us into tireless cultivators of the seeds of the Gospel.

May those seeds transform from within both humanity and the whole cosmos in the sure expectation of a new heaven and a new earth, when, with the powers of evil vanquished,

your glory will shine eternally. May the grace of the Jubilee reawaken in us, Pilgrims of Hope, a yearning for the treasures of heaven.

May that same grace spread the joy and peace of our Redeemer throughout the earth. To you our God, eternally blessed, be glory and praise for ever. O Lord, we pray

songs.title: THE SOLEMNITY OF OUR LORD
songs.lyrics:
FIRST READING 2 Samuel 5:1-3 They anointed David king over Israel

HebronIn those days: All the tribes of Israel came to David at Hebron, and said, "Behold, we are your bone and flesh, In times past, when Saul was king over us, it was you that led out and brought in Israel; and the LORD said to you,

Hebron 'You shall be shepherd of my people Israel, and you shall be prince over Israel. "' so all the elders of Israel came to the king at Hebron; and King David made a covenant with them at Hebron before the LORD, and they anointed David king over Israel. The word of the Lord.

RESPONSORIAL PSALM Psalm 122:1-2-4-5(R1)

R. Let us go rejoicing to the house of the Lord.

I rejoiced when they said to me, "Let us go to the house of the LORD." And now our feet are standing within your gates, O Jerusalem R,

It is there that the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD. For Israel's witness it is to praise the name of the LORD. There were set the thrones for judgment, Ones of the house of David. R,

SECOND READING Colossians 1:12-20 He has transferred us to the kingdom of his beloved Son,

Brethren: We give thanks to the Father, who has qualified us to share in the inheritance of the saints in light. He has delivered us from the dominion of darkness and transferred us to the kingdom of his beloved Son, in whom we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins.

He is the image of the invisible God, the first-born of all creation; for in him all things were created, in heaven and on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or authorities all things were created through him and for him.

He is before all things, and in him all things hold together. He is the head of the body, the Church; he is the beginning, the first-born from the dead, that in everything he might be pre-eminent.

For in him all the fullness of God was pleased to dwell, and through him to reconcile to himself all things, whether on earth or in heaven, making peace by the blood of his cross. The word of the Lord.

GOSPEL ACCLAMATION Mark 11:9b,10a Alleluia. Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord! Blessed is the kingdom of our father David that is coming! Alleluia.

GOSPEL Luke 23:35-43 Lord, remember me when you come in your kingly power,

At that time: The rulers scoffed at Jesus, saying, "He saved others; let him save himself, if the is the Christ of God, his Chosen One!" The soldiers also mocked him,

coming up and offering him vinegar, and saying, "If you are the King of the Jews, save yourself?' There was also an inscription over him, "This is the King of the Jews."

One of the criminals who were hanged railed at him, saying, "Are you not the Christ? Save yourself and us!" But the other rebuked him, saying, "Do you not fear God, since you are under the same sentence of condemnation?

And we indeed justly; for we are receiving the due reward of our deeds; but this man has done nothing wrong." And he said, "Jesus, remember me when you come in your kingly power."

And he said to him, "Truly, I say to you, today you will be with me in Paradise." The Gospel of the Lord.

Twendeni twende (tufike) aliko gjina lake ni emanueli ni Mungu pamoja nasi twe - nde aliko twendeni tukamwabudu.

songs.title: TWENDENI KWA KARAMU
songs.lyrics:
TWENDENI KWA KARAMU


1.Twendeni kwa karamu ya Bwana tumeitwa–twendeni,twende kumpokea. Ni mwaliko wa Bwana–tukale mkate wa uzima


2.Tujitakase mbele ya kwenda kwa karamu hii-twendeni,twende kumpokea. Twende watakatifu-tukale mkate wa uzima


3.Karibu kwangu,Yesu ukae kwangu daima-twendeni,twende kumpokea. Nifunze njia yako-tukale mkate wa uzima


4.Na Kwa uwezo wako imani yangu nakiri-twendeni,twende kumpokea.- Ndiwe Mungu Mwokozi tukale mkate wa uzima-


5.Usituache basi,pamoja nasi ukae-twendeni,twende kumpokea. Kwa kuwa kumekuchwa-tukale mkate wa uzima


6.Na tufurahi mwisho pamwe na Baba milele–twendeni,twende kumpokea. Kwa umoja na Roho-tukale mkate wa uzima

songs.lyrics:
Twendeni mezani mwa bwana

2.Damu yake Bwana kinywaji cha mbingu,tumeandaliwa kinywaji cha mbingu

3.Kila aulaye apate uzima tumeandaliwa chakula cha mbingu

songs.lyrics:
TWENDENI TUKAMTOLEE

Twendeni tukamtolee mungu sadaka madhabahuni pake kama desturi yetu twendeni tukamtolee vyote ni yeye ametujalia tumtolee kama shukrani kama desturi yetu twendeni tukamtolee

1. Kile alichokujalia na moyo wako ukaridhia ukampe Bwana utakurudishia baraka

2. Rudi kwanza ukapatane na yule muliokoseana ndipo ukatoe na Bwana Mungu akubariki

3. Toa kwa moyo wa upendo na tena kwa moyo wa shukrani naye Bwana Mungu ayabariki maisha yako

songs.title: Twimbe kwa shangwe (latetest)
songs.lyrics:
Twimbe kwa shangwe na furaha *2 Bwana ametufanyia makuu*2

1.Tuingie kwake Mungu wetu, Tuingie kwake kwa shukrani, Bwana ametufanyia makuu

2.Yeye ndiye Mungu wa miungu, Yeye ndiye Bwana wa mabwana, Bwana ametufanyia makuu

3.Bwana ni mfalme wa wafalme, Yeye ndiye Baba wa viumbe, Bwana ametufanyia makuu

4.Ametenda mambo ya ajabu, Aliye gizani hatajua, Bwana ametufanyia makuu

5.Tuingie kwake Muumba wetu Tuingie kwake kwa shukrani Bwana ametufanyia makuu

6.Sifa na heshima kwake Mungu Mwenye utukufu wa ajabu Bwana ametufanyia makuu

songs.title: UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE  (SEKWENSIA)2022
songs.lyrics:
UJE ROHO MTAKATIFU TUANGAZE(SEKWENSEA)

1.uje Roho Mtakatifu,tuangaze toka mbingu Roho zetu kwa mwangao

2.Uje Baba wa maskini,uje mtoa wa vipaji uje mwanga wa mioyo

3.Ee Mfariji mwema sana,ee Rafiki mwanana Ewe raha mustarehe

4.Kwenye kazi u pumziko,kwenye joto,burudiko u mfutaji wa machozi

5.Ewe mwanga wenye heri,uwajaze waamini Neema yako mioyoni

6.Bila nguvu yakow ewe,mwanadamu hana kitu kwake yote yana kosa

7.Osha machafuko yetu,panyeshee pakavu petu Na kuponya majeraha

8.Ulegeze ukaidi,washa moto wa uadili Nyoosha upotevu wote

9.wape waumini wako ,wenye tumaini kwako paji zako zote saba

10.Wape tuzo ya fadhila wape mwisho bila hila Wape heri milele

songs.title: Unihurumie mimi  MANENO YA WIMBO
songs.lyrics:
Maneno ya wimbo .

Unihurumie mimi Bwana, nimetenda dhambi mimi Bwana, ninakusihi, ee Mungu wangu, unisamehe, makosa yangu, ( niliyokutendea wewe Mungu wangu na jirani zangu ) x 2

1.Dhambi zimenitenga nawe, Bwana unihurumie, mimi ni mkosefu.

2. Nauogopa uso wako, kwani nimekosa Baba, unihurumie.

3. Ewe Baba mwenye huruma, unihurumie mimi, nimetenda dhambi.

4. Uisafishe roho yangu, uniimarishe Bwana, nisitende dhambi

songs.title: Uninyunyizie maji  new
songs.lyrics:
Uninyunyizie maji (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

Mimi ni mwenye dhambi (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

Natamani nije kwako (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

Naingia nyumba yako (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

Niuone uso wako (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

Nifurahi milele (Bwana) *2 Unioshe nitakate (kweli) Niwe mweupe kabisa *2

songs.title: UNIONDOLEE DHAMBI
songs.lyrics:
UNIONDOLEE DHAMBI


Uniondolee dhambi nitakase, Unioshe niwe mweupe pe x2


1.Nakiri makosa yangu, naziona dhambi zangu Unioshe niwe mweupe


2.Kweli mimi mkosefu, tangu kuzaliwa kwangu mwenye dhambi tangu tumboni mwa mamangu


3.Hivyo unafanya vyema, we unaponihukumu Una haki unaponiadhibu


4.Wewe wataka unyofu, ule unyofu wa ndani Nifundishe hekima moyoni


5.Niumbie moyo safi, na uweke ndani yangu Roho mpya iliyo dhabiti

songs.title: Usiku wa manane kazaliwa
songs.lyrics:
SHANGWE ZA NOELI

1. Usiku wa manane kazaliwa mwokozi Yesu aleluya aleluya ndiye mwana wa maria mkombozi wa ulimwengu aleluya aleluya.

Noeli noeli amezaliwa Shangwe za noeli amezaliwa aleluya tushangilie X2.

2. Mungu kajifanya mwili akazaliwa kati yetu aleluya aleluya Nuru imetung'aria tuimbe na tushangilie aleluya aleluya.

3. Amezaliwa Emanueli Mungu pamoja nasi aleluya aleluya Shangwe furaha duniani kazaliwa mwokozi wetu aleluya aleluya.

songs.title: Utambi mchafu
songs.lyrics:
MWANZI ULIOPONDEKA


1.Utambi mchafu wa moshi mzito Hata uzima kadhalika mwanzi Uliopondeka kamwe hata uvunja


Hatanitupa bwana yesu (milele yote) atanipigania Hataniacha bwana yesu (niangamie) atanipigania


2.Najua mtetesi wangu ni mwema Mwenye huruma mwingi wa rehema Asiye yahesabu maovu ya watu


3.Nakiri mimi mdhaifu kabisa Nimeanguka kulitii neno Lakini ni tamuangukia mwenyezi


4.Nanyi ndugu zangu kweenu Na tubu niliyofanya si kuwapendeza Nisamehe nichukulie ni pia


5.Sikati tamaa kwa kuwa najua Yesu Mwokozi amenisamehe Kwa kuwa hiyo ndio tabia ya yesu

songs.title: UTUKFU ST CECILA(MWASHUMA)
songs.lyrics:
UTUKUFU ST CECILA

(utukufu juu kwake Mungu Baba ) na amani iwe duniani kote , kwa watu wenye ma-penzi mema x2

1. Tunaku-sifu tunakuheshimu , tunakuabudu tunakutukuza

2. Tunakushukuru Mungu kwa ajili ya utukufu wako Bwana Mungu

3. Ee bwana yesu mwana wa pekee , mwana kondoo wake Mungu Baba

4. Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za dunia, utuhurumie utusikilize

5.Mwenye kuuketi kuume kwake baba, peke yako mkuu peke yako kristu

6.Pamoja na roho, roho mtakatifu ndani yake baba una tu-ukuzwa

songs.title: UTUKUFU REHEMA
songs.lyrics:
Utukufu uwe kwa mungu [na amani duniani watu wenye mapenzi mema]X2


1.Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu, tunakuabudu tunakutukuza



2.Tunakushuru mfalme wa mbinguni mwana wa pekee mwana wake baba


3.unayeondoa dhambi za dunia utuhurumie utusikilize


4.Kuume kwa Baba we unakoketi,mtakatifu mkuu utuhurumie


5.Roho mtakatifu kwa umoja nawe tukufu wa baba milele amina

songs.title: utukufu st joseph
songs.lyrics:
utukufu st joseph

utukufu kwa mbinguni na amani kwa watu wa mapenzi mema

Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu tunakuabudu tunakutukuzaX2

1.twakushukuru mwenye utukufu mfalme wa mbinguni mungu naye baba yetu

2.Ee bwana yesu mwana wa pekee uliye mwana wa pekee mwana kondoo wa mungu

3.Mwenye kufuta dhambi za dunia utuhurumie na utusikilize

4.Unayeketi kuume kwa baba upokee yako mkuu ewe yesu kristu

5.Pamoja naye roho mtakatifu katika utukufu wa mungu baba

songs.title: UTUKUFU SUBUKIA MASS NEW LYRICS
songs.lyrics:
UTUKUFU SUBUKIA MASS NEW LYRICS

Utukufu kwa Mungu juu na amani duniani, Kwa watu aliowaridhia, kwa watu aliowaridhia (x2)

1. Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu, twakuabudu tunakutukuza, Twakushukuru kwa ajili ya utukufu wako mkuu.

2. Ee Bwana Mungu mfalme wa mbinguni Mungu Baba mwenyezi, Ee Bwana Yesu Kristo mwana pekee, ee Bwana Mungu mwana kondoo wa Mungu, mwana wa Baba.

3. Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za ulimwengu tuhuru mie, utuhurumie, Mwenye kuondoa dhambi za ulimwengu pokea ombi letu.

4. Mwenye kuketi kuume kwa Baba utuhurumie utuhurumie, Kwa kuwa ndiwe uliye peke yako mtakatifu peke yako, Bwana uliye juu kabisa, Yesu Kristo katika utukufu.

5. Pamoja na roho mtakatifu, katika utukufu, Wa Mungu Baba Amina Amina Amina.

MISA SUBUKIA

UTUHURUMIE Bwana, Bwana, Bwana utuhurumie *2 Kristu utuhurumie, Kristu utuhurumie *2 Bwana, Bwana, Bwana utuhurumie *2

UTUKUFU (SUBUKIA)

Utukufu juu kwa Mungu, na amani duniani, kwao watu wenye mapenzi, watu wenye mapenzi mema *2

1.Tunakusifu tunakuheshimu, twakuabudu tunakutukuza Twakushukuru kwa ajili yako, ya utukufu wako mkuu.

2.Ee Mungu baba ndiwe mfalme, Mfalme wa Mbinguni baba mwenyezi. Ee Yesu Kristu mwana wa pekee, mwanakondoo mwana wa Baba.

3.Uondoaye dhambi za watu tuhurumie tusikilize, Tuhurumie mwenye rehema maombi yetu uyapokee.

4.Uketiye kuume kwake, Mungu baba tuhurumie. Kwa kuwa ndiwe pekee yako, Pekee yako Mtakatifu.

5.Pamoja naye roho Mtakatifu, katika utukufu wake Anayeishi na kutawala, milele yote Amina.

songs.title: VIPAJI HIVI  NI  KAMA DHABIHU
songs.lyrics:
VIPAJI HIVI NI KAMA DHABIHU

Vipaji hivi ni,kama dhabihu yenye harufu nzuri sadaka inayo kubaliwa na kumpendeza Mungu X2 kwa furaha ,kwa imani,kwa mapendo tutoe(na)tutoe kwa shukrani X2

1. Tupeleke mazao ya mashamba tupeleke nayo mifugo Tupeleke vilivyo vinono kama sadaka ya Abeli

2. Nazo fedha ni mali ya bwana, tumepata kwa neema zake Tupeleke kwa moyo was ala tupeleke shukrani zetu

3.Tupeleke nazo nafsi zetu, tuzitoe kama dhabihu Tumwombe mungu atubariki,tukatende impendezavyo

songs.title: Vipaji tumepewa,
songs.lyrics:
1.Vipaji tumepewa, mapato tumepata Lakini binadamu tunashindwa kushukuru Wakati tunaomba, tunajinyenyekesha Lakini tukipata mikono yetu birika

Mpeni kaisari, yaliyo yake Mpeni Mungu (yale) yaliyo yake Mungu *2

2.Mifugo tunafuga, nafaka tunavuna Lakini kila siku tunakula na kusaza Kumbuka kuna wale, wasio na chochote Hawawezi kupata, hata kikombe cha chai

3.Tunapofanya kazi, twapata mishahara Shughuli zetu sisi kuingia kwenye baa Ikiwa zitabaki, twakuja kanisani Twamtolea Mungu, shilingi moja na tano

4.Tukiwa na wagonjwa hatuwasaidii Wakati wamekufa tunachanga kwa huzuni Twachukua mikopo, kwa mambo ya anasa Ujenzi wa kanisa, twalazimishwa kutoa.

5.Kumbuka Ibrahimu, alitoa mwanawe Kama sadaka kwake Mungu Baba wa mbinguni Na sisi kwa furaha, tupeleke zawadi Itakayopendeza, kama ile ya Abeli

Nimtume nani? Unitume mimi, unitue bwana Nitakwenda kutangaza neno lako Bwana Mataifa ya dunia yakufuate wewe unitume mimi nitume Bwana


Bwana akasema nimtume nani, aende kuwahubiria mataifa?


Nimtume nani? Unitume mimi, unitue bwana Nitakwenda kutangaza neno lako Bwana Mataifa ya dunia yakufuate wewe unitume mimi nitume Bwana


Bwana amenituma kuihubiri habari njema kwa watu; Roho wa Bwana yu juu yangu


Nimtume nani? Unitume mimi, unitue bwana Nitakwenda kutangaza neno lako Bwana Mataifa ya dunia yakufuate wewe unitume mimi nitume Bwana


Kwa maana ameniitia mafuta kuwahubiria maskini habari njema


Nimtume nani? Unitume mimi, unitue bwana Nitakwenda kutangaza neno lako Bwana Mataifa ya dunia yakufuate wewe unitume mimi nitume Bwana


NIMTUME NANI


CHORUS Nimtume nani aende akaihubiri injili nitume bwana *2 nitakwenda kutaqngaza injili yako mbele ya mataifa wasikie neno lako wakufuate*2


# VERSE 1 # 1.Wasikie neno lako wakutambue ya kuwa wewe ndiwe kimbilio letu


CHORUS Nimtume nani aende akaihubiri injili nitume bwana *2 nitakwenda kutaqngaza injili yako mbele ya mataifa wasikie neno lako wakufuate*2


# VERSE 2 # 1.Nitakwenda kutangaza injili yako mataifa wasikie wakufuate


CHORUS Nimtume nani aende akaihubiri injili nitume bwana *2 nitakwenda kutaqngaza injili yako mbele ya mataifa wasikie neno lako wakufuate*2


VERSE 3 3. Utujalie amani na usalama katika kuitangaza injili yako


CHORUS Nimtume nani aende akaihubiri injili nitume bwana *2 nitakwenda kutaqngaza injili yako mbele ya mataifa wasikie neno lako wakufuate*2


VERSE 4 4. Utuongoze katika safari yetu na mwisho utfikishe juu mbinguni

songs.title: WAKRISTU WOTE TUSIMAME
songs.lyrics:
WAKRISTU WOTE TUSIMAME

Wakristu wote tusimame tutangaze injili yake Bwana wetu iende mbele X2

Iende mbele injili iende mbele injili ya yesu injili iende mbele X2

2. Watawa wote tusimame tutangaze injili yake Bwana wetu iende mbele X2

3.vijana wote tusimame tutangaze injili yake Bwana wetu iende mbele X2

4. Watoto wote tusimame tutangaze injili yake Bwana wetu iende mbele X2

5. Mapadre wote tusimame tutangaze injili yake Bwana wetu iende mbele X2

songs.title: Wateule wa Bwana
songs.lyrics:
Wateule wa Bwana


chorus Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2 Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2


verse 1 Kwanza tujitakase nafsi zetu wenyewe tukisha kutakasa tujongee meza yake


chorus Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2 Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2


verse 2 Karibuni mezani , Bwana atualiaka kwenye karamu yake, enyi wenye moyo safi


chorus Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2 Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2


verse 3 Natule mwili wake natunywe damu yake, ndicho chakula bora cha rohoni karibuni.


chorus Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2 Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2


verse 4 Tusipokula mwili na kunywa damu yake,tunazinyima roho, zetu neema zake Bwana


chorus Wateule wa Bwana karibuni mezani Pake (njooni) Bwana awaalika enyi wenye moyo safi x 2 Amewaandalia (Leo) karamu takatifu (Njooni) mwili na damu yake chakula safi cha roho x 2

songs.title: watu imbeni
songs.lyrics:
watu imbeni, watu imbine pasa sauti zenu imbeni malaika. malaika malaika nanyi sifuni malaika malaika wa mbinguni

sifuni tumwimbie Mungu wetu tumshangilie.

1. Njoni na tarumbeta, njuga na vinanda.

2. Anga ishangilie nchi irukeruke.

3. Enzi zimwadhimishe zama zimhubiri.

4. Yeye amezipata sifa tumpambazo.

songs.title: Watu imbeni  paza sauti zenu
songs.lyrics:
Watu imbeni x2 paza sauti zenu imbeni Malaika,malaika nanyi sifuni, malaika malaika mbinguni sifuni tumwimbie Mungu wetu tumshangilie.

1. Njoni na tarumbeta njuga na vinanda

2. Anga ishangilie nchi irukeruke

3. Enzi zimwadhimishe zama zimhubiri

4. Yeye amezipata sifa tumpambazo

songs.title: waumini tutoe sadaka
songs.lyrics:
waumini tutoe sadaka tulivyo sadaka tulivyo navyo tutoeni,tumtolee kwa ukarimu mungu mungu wetu atubariki inuka utoe sadaka kwa bwana kwa mema yake yote X2

1. Tutoe sadaka kwake yote bwana kwa ukarimu tujiwekee uzima yetu mbinguni

2. Kutoa si mali yako wewe mbali ni moyo toeni kwa bwana naye atawabariki

3. Ametujalia afya njema bila malipo kwa upendo wake kwetu sisi tumtolee

songs.title: We Asa osa nthembo
songs.lyrics:
{ We Asa osa nthembo yaitu, We Asa osa na uituathima } *2

1( Na Mukate wumite nganuni ya nthi We Asa osa na uituathima } *2

2. Na ndivai yumite nzavivuni ya nthi We Asa osa na uituathima

3.Na mbesa syumite mivukoni ya nthi We Asa osa na uituathima

4.Na ngetha yumite miundani ya nthi We Asa osa na uituathima

5.Na malondu maumite ndithyani yitu ya nthi We Asa osa na uituathima

songs.title: WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO
songs.lyrics:
WE NDUKAHUNIE GUOKO


1.We ndukahunie guoko riria ugucokia ngatho; Ngai we ndakuheire o kingotore; Ni manoti matheri ;ni mburi na ni ng'ombe; Ni Kahua, macani na indo ingi.


Ruta muhothi waku Ciana cione ndathimi,Aciari na arata marathimwo( Biacara yaku) nayo irathimwo Ihote guthererema. Tanahira Ngai uria wakuheire.(Ndukahunie guoko)


2.Ti kumuhe ukumuhe ni guoko ugucokia' Na niundu wa indo ciothe iria akuhete.Wakariha na ciene ,ko ni ciaku ungika atia? Kenia Ngai na ngatho yaku.


3.Ugoti wa Gaithari Mwathani ekuga urute n'omenye urute ugoti,ii wa Mwathani. Kanitha ni muhothi wee nawe ukirungii ha?, Ta kirute kanitha yakike


4.Iga muthithu waku bengi-'ni ya Mwathani Niguo Kanitha yake igithereme, Niaribaragirira kinya ugakinya gwake. Uguo-ta-iga bengi-ni yake.

songs.title: WE THREE KINGS
songs.lyrics:
We three kings of orient are Bearing gifts we traverse afar Field and fountain Moor and mountain Following yonder star

O star of wonder, star of night Star with royal beauty bright Westward leading, still proceeding Guide us to thy perfect light

Born a King on Bethlehem's plain Gold I bring to crown Him again King for ever, ceasing never Over us all to reign

Frankincense to offer have I Incense owns a Deity nigh Prayer and praising, all men raising Worship Him, God most high

Glorious now behold Him arise King and God and Sacrifice! Al-le-lu-ia, al-le-lu-ia Heaven to earth replies

songs.title: WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI
songs.lyrics:
WIMUKUMIE WEE MWATHANI

Wimukumie wee Mwathani ,Ngai wa thin na waiguru, niundu wotana waku? nitwamukirite matege maya twarehe X2

1. Mugate hamwe na njohi-nitwagutegera Mwathani Maciaro ma migunda itu - twagikuria umamukire

2.Magetha ohamwe na mbecea- ni thithino ya moko maitu

3.Mahiu ona migunda itu -ona mawira maitu mothe

4 Ikeno na mathina maitu- Mahoya matarania maitu

5. Bururi atongoria aitu- Micii itu aturi akuo

songs.title: Yatosha sasa
songs.lyrics:
Yatosha sasa mahangaiko haya, yatosha, mapigo ni mengi mno. Yatosha sasa mateso makali haya, yatosha kabisa, yatosha mno.

1. Ee Mungu tazama chozi langu, sikiliza kilio changu. Narudi kwako mara nyingine, kulilia huruma yako.

2. Natamani nami nipumzike, Ee Mungu chukua hatua. Kwa nini unanyamaza kimya, naita mpaka nazimia?

3. Siwezi, siwezi ee Mungu; Mizigo yanielemea.

4. Upendo wako Mungu, nitautumainia bila kuchoka.

5. Huruma yako Mungu, ni huruma ya milele. Huruma yako Mungu, nitakufa nikiitumainia.

songs.title: YESU AKALIA
songs.lyrics:
YESU AKALIA

Yesu akalia sauti kuu (akasema)baba mikononi mwako naiweka roho yanguX2

1.Alipo kwisha kusema hayo,akakata roho yule akida alipoona hayo akasema huyu hakika alikuwa mwana wa mungu.

2. Na makutano yote ya watu walohudhulia wakafadhaika wakaenda zao waliomba akapigapiga vifua kuomba

3.Na wote waliojuana naye,waloadamana na walomfuata toka galilaya kwa Pamoja wakasimama Wakitazama mambo hayo

songs.title: Yesu Asante sana
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Asante sana Yesu asante sana x 2 Kujifanya chakula x 2 Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Wewe ndiwe chetu chakula uzima umetushibisha Yesu asante


Yesu Asante sana Yesu asante sana x 2 Kujifanya chakula x 2 Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Kila tunapokula mkate huu tunapata uzima wa milele


Yesu Asante sana Yesu asante sana x 2 Kujifanya chakula x 2 Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Kila tunapokunywa kikombe hiki tunapata uzima wa milele.


Yesu Asante sana Yesu asante sana x 2 Kujifanya chakula x 2 Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2


Twashukuru ee Yesu kwa wema wako. Umetushibisha yesu asante.


Yesu Asante sana Yesu asante sana x 2 Kujifanya chakula x 2 Kutuletea shibe alama ya pendo x 2

songs.title: YESU ATUALIKA(WAITHAKA)
songs.lyrics:
YESU ATUALIKA

Yesu atualika( W)Yesu atualika mezani Twendeni kumpokea (W) Twendeni kumpokea kwa Shangwe

1. Anatugawia chakula cha mbinguni Yesu.

2. Anatushibisha kwa chakula bora Yesu

3. Atuburudisha kwa kinywaji safi Yesu

4. Tuwe na imani ili tuweze pata uzima.

songs.title: Yesu kristu ni mfalme
songs.lyrics:
Yesu kristu ni mfalme ni mfalme wa wafalme ni bwana wa mabwana utawala wake si wa dunia hii(bali) utawala wake ni wa mbinguni

1.Utawala wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika angekua jeshi lake la kumlinda

2.Utawala wake yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) hakika ingekuwa na serikali ya kuiongoza

3.Utawala wake yesu unjgekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli)kamwe asingekufa kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu

songs.title: Yesu kristu ni mfalme by chavalla
songs.lyrics:
Yesu kristu ni mfalme by chavalla

yesu kristu ni mfalme Ni mfalme wa wafalme, Ni Bwana wa mabwana Utawala wake si wa dunia hii [Dunia hii] Utawala wake ni wa Mbinguni.

1.Utawala wake Yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) Hakika angekuwa na jeshi lake la kumlinda.

2. Utawala wake Yesu ungekuwa ni dunia hii (kweli) Hakika angekuwa na serikali ya kuiongoza.

3. Utawala wake Yesu ungekuwa ni wa dunia hii (kweli) Kamwe asingekufa kwa ajili yetu sisi wanadamu.

songs.title: Yesu Mwema najitolea
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Mwema


Verse 1 Yesu Mwema najitolea kwako kwa leo hii na siku zote Nafsi yangu na moyo wangu wote (heri kweli)x 3 Raha ya uwingu


Verse 2 Ndani yangu umekuja daima kuwa nami ni pendo lako ewe mpenzi mwenye utamu mwingi ( ni Mapendo) x 3 ya moyo wako


Verse 4 Nitaweza kukurundishia nini kwa wema huu wa pendo lako Roho yangu ume ifadhili (nikupende)x 2 kukupenda ni tama yangu.





weka rabi katika roho yangu wema wako na unyenyekevu Na upendo kuu fadhili ya imani (niongoze) x3 katika imani

songs.title: YESU NAKUTAMANI
songs.lyrics:
Yesu Nakuhitaji

Yesu wangu nakutamani nakutamani Yesu wangu nakutamani rohoni mwangu kweli Yesu wangu nakuhitaji nakuhitaji Yesu wangu nakuhitaji maishani mwangu Ni wewe ni wewe tegemeo langu ni wewe ni wewe kimbilio langu ni wewe ni wewe mwokozi wangu wa Roho yangu x2

1. (a) Nakukaribisha Yesu moyoni mwangu, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha. (b) Kaa nami-ndani yangu nami ndani yako,ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.

2. (a) Nathubutu kuringia uwepo wako, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha. (b) Nahisi furaha moyoni ni-kiwa nawe, ingia moyoni mwangu unipe raha.

songs.title: YESU NI UZIMA WANGU WAITHAKA
songs.lyrics:
YESU NI UZIMA WANGU

(Ee Yesu wewe ni uzima wangu, kiongozi bora wa maisha yangu, nilapo mwili wako na kunywa damu yako, naupata uzima wa milele) x2

1. Nishibishe kwa mwili wako yesu, nipate wokovu wa maisha yangu

2. Uninyweshe kwa damu yako ee ye-su, niurithi uzima wa milele

3. Ee bwana ingia moyoni mwangu, uwe wangu nami kweli niwe wako.

4. Ee yesu tawala maisha yangu, nihubiri neno lako siku zote.

songs.title: Yuda akarudi
songs.lyrics:
Yuda akarudi, chukua fedha zenu huyu ni mwema, Pilato akakiri hana kosa lakini kamuueni, Kainuliwa mtupu na kajeruhiwa sana, Amekata roho, nchi inazizima kwa huzuni kuu. Ona damu, mwili umelowana

1 Ona nyama, madonda mwili mzima Moyo wake, nao umetoboka. Mate yao, yamemfunika uso.

2 Meno yake, kang'ata kwa uchungu. Nafsi yangu, imemjeruhi Yesu Dhambi zangu, zikamchomoa roho Mungu wangu, nionjeshe uchungu

3 Ili nife, pamoja naye Kristu Mwisho nije, nikafufuke naye

songs.title: Yumo humu mwokozi
songs.lyrics:
Yumo humu mwokozi.


verse 1 Yumo humu mwokozi Yesu kwenye Mzabibu na ngano tamu ni mpole ni mwema ni uzima.


chorus Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu.


verse 2 Ekaristi ni Jina lake pamoja nasi Mungu mwenyewe ndani yetu nasi ndani yake


chorus Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 3 Alitoa njioni ili, kwa kumbukumbu yake milele, tule tunywe wote tuokoke.


chorus Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu


verse 4 Tugeuze maisha yetu yakafanana na meza hii huruma upendo na msamaha.


chorus Waumini simameni, polepole kwa maringo njongeeni karamuni mpate kumwonja mwokozi Yesu

songs.title: Zaeni Matunda Mema
songs.lyrics:
ZAENI MATUNDA


Verse 1 Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni matunda yale Zaeni yenye baraka, zaeni ya heri


Chorus Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema; Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 2 Safisha mwenendo wako, safisha matendo yako; Safisha na Bwana Yesu, safisha yote.


Chorus Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema; Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 3 Fanyeni kazi kidugu, fanyeni kazi kwa bidii; Fanyeni na Bwana Yesu; fanyeni yote.


Chorus Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema; Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 4 Tolea matunda yako, pamoja na moyo wako; Naye Bwana, Mungu wako, atakubariki.


Chorus Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema; Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.


Verse 5 Baraka za Mungu Baba, baraka za Mungu mwana; Na za Roho Mtakatifu ziwe nanyi nyote.


Chorus Bwana akiyapokea, yatabarikiwa vyema; Zaeni matunda mema, zaeni ya heri.

songs.title: Zimetiririka Zimetiririka
songs.lyrics:
1. Zimetiririka zimetiririka, Zimetiririka neema za Mungu

{ Zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka, neema zimetiririka Wote tumeinuliwa aleluya }

{ Majumbani mwetu (zimetiririka) Mashambani mwetu (zimetiririka tiririka) Familia zetu (zimetiririka) tumeinuliwa aleluya } *2

2. Tazama mimea inavyochanua, Hizi ni neema kutoka Mbinguni

3. Tazama bahari na mawimbi yake Vinashangilia neema za Mungu

4. Tazama wanyama wanavyopendeza Ndege wa angani wanaburudisha

5. Mvua inanyesha jua inawaka Kuukamilisha utukufu wake

6. Mchana na usiku vinatuongoza Kuyafurahia majira ya mwaka

7. Mbingu zafurahi na mawingu yote Vinashangilia neema za Mungu
